overview: Barely covered by the Bikinis they wear...Bree & friends party heart at the beach. Emotions run high as Bree and boyfriend, Frankie argue.. then go their own ways to find sexual healing! Wow, do they find it!!! Bree with a bevy of surfer dudes and Frankie with luscious, limpid island maidens. The sex is as hot as a volcano and more powerful than an explosively, humongous wave!! Cowanbunga!
title: Bree's Beach Party 2
